verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> this opened <S%H6605><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and cursed <S%H7043><s%> his day <S%H3117><s%>.
And Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>:
Let the day <S%H3117><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> wherein I was born <S%H3205><s%>, And the night <S%H3915><s%> which said <S%H559><s%>, There is a man-child <S%H1397><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%>.
Let that day <S%H3117><s%> be darkness <S%H2822><s%>; Let not God <S%H433><s%> from above <S%H4605><s%> seek <S%H1875><s%> for it <S%H5105><s%>, Neither let the light shine upon it <S%H3313><s%>.

Let darkness <S%H2822><s%> and the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%> claim <S%H1350><s%> it for their own <S%H6053><s%>; Let a cloud dwell <S%H7931><s%> upon it <S%H3650><s%>; Let all that maketh black the day <S%H3117><s%> terrify it <S%H1204><s%>.

As for that night <S%H3915><s%>, let thick darkness <S%H652><s%> seize <S%H3947><s%> upon it <S%H2302><s%>: Let it not rejoice among the days <S%H3117><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>; Let it not come <S%H935><s%> into the number <S%H4557><s%> of the months <S%H3391><s%>.
Lo <S%H3915><s%>, let that night be barren <S%H1565><s%>; Let no joyful voice <S%H7445><s%> come therein <S%H935><s%>.
Let them curse <S%H5344><s%> it that curse <S%H779><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%>, Who are ready <S%H6264><s%> to rouse up <S%H5782><s%> leviathan <S%H3882><s%>.

Let the stars <S%H3556><s%> of the twilight <S%H5399><s%> thereof be dark <S%H2821><s%>: Let it look <S%H6960><s%> for light <S%H216><s%>, but have none <S%H7200><s%>; Neither let it behold the eyelids <S%H6079><s%> of the morning <S%H7837><s%>:
Because it shut not up <S%H5462><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of my mother <S%H990><s%>'s womb, Nor hid <S%H5641><s%> trouble <S%H5999><s%> from mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
Why died <S%H4191><s%> I not from the womb <S%H7358><s%>? Why did I not give up the ghost <S%H1478><s%> when my mother <S%H990><s%> bare me <S%H3318><s%>?
Why did the knees <S%H1290><s%> receive <S%H6923><s%> me <S%H7699><s%>? Or why the breast, that I should suck <S%H3243><s%>?
For now should I have lain down <S%H7901><s%> and been quiet <S%H8252><s%>; I should have slept <S%H3462><s%>; then had I been at rest <S%H5117><s%>,
With kings <S%H4428><s%> and counsellors <S%H3289><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, Who built <S%H1129><s%> up waste places for themselves <S%H2723><s%>;
Or with princes <S%H8269><s%> that had gold <S%H2091><s%>, Who filled <S%H4390><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%> with silver <S%H3701><s%>:
Or as a hidden <S%H2934><s%> untimely birth <S%H5309><s%> I had not been <S%H5768><s%>, As infants that never saw <S%H7200><s%> light <S%H216><s%>.
There the wicked <S%H7563><s%> cease <S%H2308><s%> from troubling <S%H7267><s%>; And there the weary <S%H3019><s%> are at rest <S%H5117><s%>.
There the prisoners <S%H615><s%> are at ease <S%H7599><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>; They hear <S%H8085><s%> not the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the taskmaster <S%H5065><s%>.
The small <S%H6996><s%> and the great <S%H1419><s%> are there <S%H5650><s%>: And the servant is free <S%H2670><s%> from his master <S%H113><s%>.
Wherefore is light <S%H216><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> to him that is in misery <S%H6001><s%>, And life <S%H2416><s%> unto the bitter <S%H4751><s%> in soul <S%H5315><s%>;
Who long <S%H2442><s%> for death <S%H4194><s%>, but it cometh not <S%H2658><s%>, And dig for it more than for hid treasures <S%H4301><s%>;
Who rejoice <S%H8056><s%> exceedingly <S%H1524><s%>, And are glad <S%H7797><s%>, when they can find <S%H4672><s%> the grave <S%H6913><s%>?
Why is light given to a man <S%H1397><s%> whose way <S%H1870><s%> is hid <S%H5641><s%>, And whom God <S%H433><s%> hath hedged in <S%H5526><s%>?
For my sighing <S%H585><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> I eat <S%H3899><s%>, And my groanings <S%H7581><s%> are poured out <S%H5413><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%>.
For the thing which I fear <S%H6342><s%> cometh <S%H857><s%> upon me <S%H3025><s%>, And that which I am afraid of cometh unto me <S%H935><s%>.
I am not at ease <S%H8252><s%>, neither am I quiet <S%H8252><s%>, neither have I rest <S%H8252><s%>; But trouble <S%H7267><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>.
